doc:
Beverly Tyler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beverly_Tyler 0 Beverly Tyler (July 5, 1927 – November 23, 2005), was an American film actress and singer who was a minor MGM leading lady who appeared in a handful of mostly B movies in the 1940s and 1950s. Beverly_Tyler ( July_5_,_1927 – November_23_,_2005 ) , was an_American_film_actress and singer who was a_minor_MGM_leading_lady who appeared in a_handful of mostly_B_movies in the_1940s_and_1950s .
